text: Kare-ra wa sake to, to ya ni tsuite anata ni toudearou. Itte yaru ga ī. `Sorera wa ōkina tsumidearuga, ningen no tame ni (tashō no) eki mo aru. Daga sono tsumi wa,-eki yori mo ōdearu.' Mata kare-ra wa, nani o hodokosubeki ka o, anata ni toudearou. Sonotoki wa,`nani demo yobun no mono o.' To itte yaru ga ī. Ko no yō ni arrā wa, shirushi o anata gata ni meiji sa reru. Osoraku anata gata wa hansei surudearou
